dialogue.content: I'm tired of having to wait for my son to help me cut my steak.
Independence at the dinner table is important. Is it a grip issue?
Yes, I can't hold the knife steady and apply enough pressure.
An 'L-shaped' rocker knife allows you to cut with a simple rocking motion.
I'm tech-savvy enough to shop for adaptive cutlery on my phone.
They make some very sleek stainless steel ones now.
Shopping for a rocker knife on my phone will finally get me off my son's help.
